    • Method Detail

      • getIdIterator

        public static java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> getIdIterator(SailPointContext context,
                                                                 java.lang.Class cls,
                                                                 Filter filter)
                                                          throws GeneralException
        Returns an iterator over ids of the objects of the specified class, optionally filtered by the provided filter. Be aware this will be a List-backed iterator so all ids will be loaded into memory.
        Parameters:
        context - The SailPoint context
        cls - The object class
        filter - An optional filter to pass to query options; if null it will be ignored
        Returns:
        an iterator over SailPoint object ids; if no ids are found an empty iterator is returned
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • renameNativeIdentityInProfile

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInProfile(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                    java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                    Profile profile)
                                             throws GeneralException
        Renames a native identity found in the value of any filters in the specified profile.
        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity - the old native identity
        newNativeIdentity - the new native identity
        profile - the profile
        Returns:
        true if a match was found
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • renameNativeIdentityInIdentitySelector

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInIdentitySelector(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                             java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                             IdentitySelector identitySelector,
                                                             java.lang.String applicationId)
                                                      throws GeneralException
        Renames a native identity found in an identity selector. This will perform a rename if the old native identity occurs in:
        • a match expression
        • a script
        • a filter

        References to Rules and GroupDefinitions are ignored.

        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity - the old native identity
        newNativeIdentity - the new native identity
        identitySelector - the identity selector
        applicationId - the application id from the event
        Returns:
        true if a match was found
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • renameNativeIdentityInMatchExpression

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInMatchExpression(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                            java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                            IdentitySelector.MatchExpression matchExpression,
                                                            java.lang.String applicationId)
                                                     throws GeneralException
        Renames a native identity found in the value of any match terms within the specified match expression.
        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity - the old native identity
        newNativeIdentity - the new native identity
        matchExpression - the match expression
        applicationId - the application from the native identity change event
        Returns:
        true if a match was found
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • renameNativeIdentityInCompoundFilter

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInCompoundFilter(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                           java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                           CompoundFilter compoundFilter)
                                                    throws GeneralException
        Renames native identities found in a compound filter.

        compoundFilter - the filter
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • renameNativeIdentityInFilter

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInFilter(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                   java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                   Filter filter)
                                            throws GeneralException
        Recursively walks the filter tree and renames a native identity found in the value of any leaf filter. This will perform a rename if the old native identity matches:
        • the String value of a leaf
        • a substring of the String value of a leaf
        • a String element of the list value of a multivalued leaf
        • a substring of a String element of the list value of a multivalued leaf

        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity - the old native identity
        newNativeIdentity - the new native identity
        filter - the filter
        Returns:
        true if a match was found
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • renameNativeIdentityInRule

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInRule(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                 java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                 Rule rule)
                                          throws GeneralException
        Handles Native Identity changes for a Rule.
        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity - - the old Native Identity string that needs to be replaced
        newNativeIdentity - - the new Native Identity string to use during replacement
        rule - - the Rule to process
        Returns:
        true if a change to the Rule source code string was detected, false otherwise
        Throws:
        GeneralException - if a null Rule is provided as a parameter, or if renameNativeIdentityInSource() is unable to attempt replacement

      • renameNativeIdentityInScript

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInScript(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                   java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                   Script script)
                                            throws GeneralException
        Handles Native Identity changes for a Script.
        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity - - the old Native Identity string that needs to be replaced
        newNativeIdentity - - the new Native Identity string to use during replacement
        script - - the Script to process
        Returns:
        true if a change to the Script source code string was detected, false otherwise
        Throws:
        GeneralException - if a null Script is provided as a parameter, or if renameNativeIdentityInSource() is unable to attempt replacement

      • renameNativeIdentityInGenericConstraint

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInGenericConstraint(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                              java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                              GenericConstraint constraint,
                                                              java.lang.String applicationId)
                                                       throws GeneralException
        Renames Native Identity strings in a GenericConstraint.
        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity - - the old Native Identity string that needs to be replaced
        newNativeIdentity - - the new Native Identity string to use during replacement
        constraint - - the GenericConstraint where replacement occurs
        applicationId - - the Application ID associated with the IdentitySelectors
        Returns:
        boolean which indicates whether a replacement occurred
        Throws:
        GeneralException - if renameNativeIdentityInIdentitySelector() fails

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInActivityConstraint(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                               java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                               ActivityConstraint constraint)
                                                        throws GeneralException

        Parameters:

        newNativeIdentity - - the new Native Identity string to use during replacement
        constraint - - the ActivityConstraint where replacement occurs

        Throws:

      • renameNativeIdentityInForm

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInForm(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                 java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                 Form form)
                                          throws GeneralException
        Renames a native identity in a Form by iterating through the form fields whether these are inside a Section or not. The rename will take place if the old native identity is found in these field elements:
        • field values
        • field filter strings
        • field allowed values and allowed values definitions
        • field attributes map
        • field scripts and validation scripts

        This will NOT rename in rules as there's a rule propagator to handle them.

        Parameters:
        oldNativeIdentity -
        newNativeIdentity -
        form - the form where replace of oldDn should take place
        Returns:
        true if matches of the old native identity were replaced with the new native identity in form fields.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInGroupDefinition(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,

        Returns:
        Throws:

      • renameNativeIdentityInApplication

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInApplication(NativeIdentityChangeEvent event,
                                                        Application application)
                                                 throws GeneralException
        Renames a native identity in an application in the following attributes:

        Composite Definition (Identity Selector) Provisioning Forms (Form) Manager Correlation Config (LeafFilter) Account Disabled Filter (ListFilterValue) Lock Account Filter (ListFilterValue) Service Account Filter (ListFilterValue) RPA Account Filter (ListFilterValue)

        Parameters:
        event -
        application -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GeneralException

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInListFilterValues(java.lang.String oldNativeIdentity,
                                                             java.lang.String newNativeIdentity,
                                                             java.util.List<sailpoint.service.listfilter.ListFilterValue> listOfListFilterValues)
                                                      throws GeneralException

        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • renameNativeIdentityInProvisioningPlan

        public static boolean renameNativeIdentityInProvisioningPlan(SailPointContext context,
                                                             ProvisioningPlan plan)
                                                      throws UnfinishedNativeIdentityChangeException,
                                                             GeneralException
        Renames a native identity in a ProvisioningPlan by iterating through the AccountRequests and AttributeRequests if there is a matching NativeIdentityChangeEvent.

        This is used to detect and replace NativeIdentity change just in time before provisioning.

        Parameters:
        context - the SailPointContext
        plan - The ProvisioningPlan where replace of oldDn should take place
        Returns:
        true if the ProvisioningPlan has been modified.
        Throws:
        UnfinishedNativeIdentityChangeException
        GeneralException

      • getNativeIdentityRenameMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getNativeIdentityRenameMap(java.util.List<ProvisioningPlan> plans)
        Computes all replaced NativeIdentity in the list of Provisioning Plans, put them in a Map, keyed by old NativeIdentity, value as new NativeIdentity. The returned Map may contain both Account renames and Group renames.
        Parameters:
        plans - List of ProvisioningPlan objects
        Returns:
        a Map containing old Native Identity and new Native Identity
